thing-type.label: Command
thing-type.description: The Command encapsulates a shell command to be executed

parameter.name: transform
parameter.label: Transform
parameter.description: The transformation to apply on the execution result, e.g. REGEX((.*)). You can chain transformations by listing each transformation on a separate line, or by separating them with the intersection character âˆ©.

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Interval, in seconds, the command will be repeatedly executed

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: Time out, in seconds, the execution of the command will time out

parameter.name: autorun
parameter.label: Autorun
parameter.description: When true, the command will execute each time the state of the input channel changes

channel-type.label: Output
channel-type.description: Output of the last execution of the command

channel-type.label: Input
channel-type.description: Input that will be passed as second parameter to the command

channel-type.label: Exit Value
channel-type.description: The exit value of the last execution of the command

channel-type.label: Running
channel-type.description: Send ON to execute the command and the current state tells whether it is running or not

channel-type.label: Last Execution
channel-type.description: Time/Date the command was last executed, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ format
